description:
Komi gets all dressed and ready for school, but when she opens the front door, she`s greeted by a typhoon. She decides to stay home and wait it out.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just a Typhoon. / It`s Just a Fantasy. / It`s Just a Cat Cafe. / It`s Just the "I Love You Game".
Taifuu Desu. / Mousou Desu. / Neko Cafe Desu. / Ai Shiteru Game Desu.
台風です. / 妄想です. / ネコカフェです. / 愛してるゲームです.
